Thank you for everything Rushiaaa!

author: Zach Yu
text: To think a pro gamer not using a shovel at all survived?! Well as long Rushia is happy, that's all it matters XD

author: Nexcell Pride
text:
Another stream that worth it.
Rushia-hime looks more lovely and calm in recent days... And that counts... :_るんるん: All love we giving to her. :_ハート:

And about gameplay, "Minecraft hardcore", I remember the 2020 June 5th stream, in that she was only at 1 hour aprox. and here she was 2 hours and 17 minutes of gameplay without dying. (The challenge was, if character dies, stream ends and goes to "Supacha Yomi Time") 

:_ちょうちょ: Personally talking: The 2020 June 05th "Minecraft Hardcore" gameplay brought many memories, when in Supaachaato Orei Time, I offered her to make an Original Song (Song is made already, the song is titled "Butterflies in the huge Night Sky") Also was the first time when Rushia pronounced already well my Stage Name (In 2 previous streams I was called "Nekusuzeru-san", but starting from that stream she pronounces "Netseru-san", along with improving her english skill)

author: Cloudypigeon
text:
She’s probably ‘calmer’ because of a lack of energy.

This would be due to her being in the hospital yesterday over a major asthma attack (check her twitter)

author: Nexcell Pride
text:
@Cloudypigeon  I read this when sudden... That's why she postponed to today the streaming.
Now it only matters that she's fine now.
